displayName: Oracle Utility Metadata API - Advanced Compression
rationale: Oracle Utility Metadata API - Advanced Compression requires a license for Oracle Advanced Compression to use.
recommended_action: Do not use the compression option with the Oracle Utility Metadata API
error_message: Oracle Utility Metadata API - Advanced Compression is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Advanced Compression
ruleNames: Oracle Utility Metadata API - Advanced Compression
